clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic Study of Econazole Nitrate and Benzydamine HCl Intravaginal Cream
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study of a Novel Intravaginal Antimycotic Cream (Econazole Nitrate 1% Plus Benzydamine HCl 0.12%) Administered Once Daily for 15 Days to Healthy Women

lead_sponsor.agency: Aziende Chimiche Riunite Angelini Francesco S.p.A

clinical_study.source: Aziende Chimiche Riunite Angelini Francesco S.p.A

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate local tolerability of the new Econazole/Benzydamine product, in comparison with the Econazole and Benzydamine stand-alone products and placebo. Pharmacokinetics of the study products after single and repeated applications once a day for 15 days, safety of the investigational products and comfort of use will also be evaluated as secondary objectives.

primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of local Adverse Events (AEs) reported in the subject's diary as 1-3 scores for pruritus, burning sensation, pain, stinging, dryness; occurrence of all the other local AEs referred by the subject; occurrence of all the local Adverse Drug Reactions (ADRs) revealed by the Investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Econazole (free base), benzydamine (free base) and benzydamine N-oxide (free base) plasma concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-dose (0), 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the first (days 1-2) and the last dose (days 15-16) and at pre-dose (0) on day 6±1, day 9±1 and day 12±1

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve [AUC(0-t)] of econazole (free base), benzydamine (free base) and benzydamine N-oxide (free base)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-dose (0), 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the first (days 1-2) and the last dose (days 15-16) and at pre-dose (0) on day 6±1, day 9±1 and day 12±1
